definition: with little or no delay, moving quickly and lightly, any area of the body that is highly sensitive to pain (as the flesh underneath the skin or a fingernail or toenail)
details:
adverb
- with little or no delay
= synonyms: quickly
adjective
- moving quickly and lightly
= synonyms: agile, nimble, spry
- easily aroused or excited
= example: easily aroused or excited
= synonyms: warm
- performed with little or no delay
= synonyms: straightaway
- accomplished rapidly and without delay
= example: accomplished rapidly and without delay
= synonyms: speedy
- hurried and brief
= synonyms: fast
- apprehending and responding with speed and sensitivity
= example: apprehending and responding with speed and sensitivity
= synonyms: ready
- alive or living
= example: alive or living
noun
- any area of the body that is highly sensitive to pain (as the flesh underneath the skin or a fingernail or toenail)
